Pre-Game Insights: Canada captain Saad Zafar said his team intends to be ruthless as they prepare to take on Bermuda in the ICC Men's T20 World Cup Americas Regional Qualifier.
Canada have never been to a T20 World Cup and are eyeing an historic maiden appearance.
Zafar stated that Canada's players are in good form after playing in the Global T20 Canada and facing experienced players from IPL.
Bermuda is the second-best team and are basically the main competition for Canada according to Zafar.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Canada's players were preparing in the Bermuda Premier League while Bermuda's players stayed on home soil.
Canada's team was in Houston for ten days to play competitive cricket before heading to the United States for more matches.
